comments: Work under this contract comprises partial building envelope repair of the Gulf of Georgia Cannery, located at 12138 Fourth Avenue, Richmond, BC. Work to be performed under this Contract includes: 1) Repainting Old Cannery Building, Vitamin Oil Shed, Dryer Shed & Dryer Addition, Open Air Storage Shed, Ice House, and roof ventilators; 2) Repainting of wood windows; 3) Dryer Addition & Evaporator roof renewal; 4) Replacement of deteriorated plank flooring in the Vitamin Oil Shed; 5) Structural repairs to wood elements; and 6) Localized Repairs at Cedar Shingle Roofs.
